forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 49. West wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 44. Northwest wind 0 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon light filters through the lingering essence of winter, Downtown San Francisco finds itself enshrined in a gentle brilliance, basking in a sunny disposition with temperatures edging close to the mid-forties. The air is crisp, the city streets echoing with the quiet hum of urban life, and while a light west wind stirs softly at nine miles per hour, it carries with it a sense of clarity that invites exploration. The forecast promises this clear spell will hold, transitioning into a cool night with a comfortable low around 44—an evening perfect for a peaceful stroll along the Embarcadero as the sun takes its leave.

Though the forecast gleams with clarity, whispers of the marine layer are always present along this coastline. Pockets of mist may still cling defiantly to the edges of the horizon, creating an ethereal balance to the otherwise vibrant scenery. Ideal attire for today encourages layers—a light sweater beneath a jacket would serve well to fend off any evening chill, while comfortable shoes will support the wanderer, ready to embrace the charm of the city from rooftop viewings to cozy cafés. This blend of sunshine and coolness invites you to take a quiet moment in one of the local parks, perhaps with a book or a warm beverage in hand, reflecting on the day's gentle peace as the city begins to shimmer under a blanket of stars.
